snippet: The British government has agreed to an amnesty that will allow international athletes, like Usain Bolt, to compete tax-free at the London Grand Prix on July 27.
abstract: British government agrees to amnesty that will allow international athletes, like Usain Bolt, to compete tax-free at London Grand Prix track and field event on July 27.
lead_paragraph: The British government has agreed to an amnesty that will allow international athletes, like Usain Bolt, to compete tax-free at the London Grand Prix on July 27.

headline.seo: Tax Rules Waived in Britain to Lure Athletes
headline.main: Tax Rules Waived in Britain to Lure Athletes
